message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I believe you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000. Let me know if this works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a little low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to go up to $9,100 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
